nodes.text:
We picked up two National Headliner awards!

2nd Place Beat Reporting for my coverage of the saga of the U.S. Postal Service. Here's one of the stories here: https://t.co/i9dfirV8Dp

2nd place Spot News Photo for @SeanSimmers' compelling work at last year's George Floyd protest: https://t.co/s8JyoTGhnr
@SeanSimmers By the by, you can see all of Sean's photos from the protest here: https://t.co/A489HlhE2s
